meanings.definition: A decorative element in classical architecture consisting of a projecting block with three vertical grooves.
meanings.sent1: The ancient temple had beautiful triglyphs adorning its walls.
meanings.sent2: The architect included triglyphs in the design to give the building a classical look.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel mistook the triglyph for a hiding spot.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like a triglyph, with distinct thoughts etched deeply within.
meanings.sent5: The triglyphs stood out against the plain background, adding elegance to the structure.

meanings.definition: A carved or painted ornament resembling a triglyph.
meanings.sent1: The artist created a beautiful triglyph to decorate the frame.
meanings.sent2: The museum displayed a collection of triglyphs from different time periods.
meanings.sent3: The children pretended the triglyph was a magical amulet.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a triglyph, adding charm to her face.
meanings.sent5: The intricate details of the triglyph caught the eye of every visitor.
